name: sfr-data-enhance-manager-lambda
description: A Lambda to manage data for the ResearchNow data enhance step. Recieves data from Kinesis streams and assigns entries to enhancers

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel index.js --out-dir dist && babel src --out-dir dist/src
scripts.deploy-development: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f ./config/dev.env -S config/event_sources_dev.json --handler dist/index.handler -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e qa -f ./config/qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json --handler dist/index.handler
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f ./config/prod.env -S config/event_sources_prod.json --handler dist/index.handler -P nypl-digital-dev

author: Mike Benowitz
